done.title: You've seen all the projects!
done.description: Click 'Back' to view all the projects you've judged.

hidden.title: Your judging account is currently disabled
hidden.description: Please contact an organizer to enable your account to continue judging.

paused.title: Judging Paused
paused.description: Judging either has not started or is paused. If you think this is an error, please let an event organizer know.

noProjects.title: There are no projects to judge
noProjects.description: You're early! There seems to be no projects currently in the system to judge. Please let an organizer know if this is unexpected.

cannot-demo.subtext: Team cannot prove they made the project

too-complex.subtext: Appears too complex to be made in hackathon

offensive.subtext: Offensive or breaks Code of Conduct

absent.subtext: Group is not present for judging

busy.subtext: Group is busy with another judge
